name: imglykit-sdk
description: img.ly filters sdk for the web
author: img.ly <contact@img.ly>

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --require should --reporter spec test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require should -R spec test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js
